titles.title: To update and improve the codification of title 46, United States Code.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR 8/4/2007 E1745)
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 110-437.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 151.

bill.summary: 11/8/2007--Reported to House amended. Makes certain updates and improvements to reflect amendments made to newly codified title 46 ("Shipping") of the United States Code.
